blocks.text: There are query parameters on each endpoint that supports ordering (aka sorting). Most fields returned in the the results can be used for ordering. A direction can also be provided to change which results are returned first.

blocks.text: The fields that are supported must be a direct child of a parent object that is returned, ordering based on nested fields is not currently supported. If you want to sort based on nested fields, make a request with the required order to those endpoints.
